name: Decimal
description: Contains methods for the Decimal primitive data type.

abs().name: abs
abs().description: Returns the absolute value of the Decimal.

divide(decimal,integer).name: divide
divide(decimal,integer).signature: public Decimal divide(Decimal divisor, Integer scale)
divide(decimal,integer).overrideSignature: public override Decimal divide(Decimal divisor, Integer scale)
divide(decimal,integer).description: Divides this Decimal by the specified divisor, and sets the scale, that is, the number of decimal places, of the result using the specified scale.

divide(decimal,integer,system.roundingmo.name: divide
divide(decimal,integer,system.roundingmo.signature: public Decimal divide(Decimal divisor, Integer scale, System.RoundingMode roundingMode)
divide(decimal,integer,system.roundingmo.overrideSignature: public override Decimal divide(Decimal divisor, Integer scale, System.RoundingMode roundingMode)
divide(decimal,integer,system.roundingmo.description: Divides this Decimal by the specified divisor, sets the scale, that is, the number of decimal places, of the result using the specified scale, and if necessary, rounds the value using the rounding mode.

doublevalue().name: doubleValue
doublevalue().description: Returns the Double value of this Decimal.

format().name: format
format().description: Returns the String value of this Decimal using the locale of the context user.

intvalue().name: intValue
intvalue().description: Returns the Integer value of this Decimal.

longvalue().name: longValue
longvalue().description: Returns the Long value of this Decimal.

pow(integer).name: pow
pow(integer).description: Returns the value of this decimal raised to the power of the specified exponent.

exponent.name: exponent
exponent.description: The value of exponent must  be between 0 and 32,767.

precision().name: precision
precision().description: Returns the total number of digits for the Decimal.

round().name: round
round().description: Returns the rounded approximation of this Decimal. The number  is rounded to zero decimal places using half-even rounding mode, that  is, it rounds towards the “nearest neighbor” unless both neighbors are equidistant, in which case, this mode rounds towards the even neighbor.

round(system.roundingmode).name: round
round(system.roundingmode).description: Returns the rounded approximation of this Decimal. The number  is rounded to zero decimal places using the rounding mode specified by the rounding mode.

scale().name: scale
scale().description: Returns the scale of the Decimal, that is, the number of decimal  places.

setscale(integer).name: setScale
setscale(integer).description: Returns the Decimal scaled to the specified number of decimal places, using half-even rounding, if necessary. Half-even rounding mode rounds toward the “nearest neighbor.” If both neighbors are equidistant, the number is rounded toward the even neighbor.

setscale(integer,system.roundingmode).name: setScale
setscale(integer,system.roundingmode).signature: public Decimal setScale(Integer scale, System.RoundingMode roundingMode)
setscale(integer,system.roundingmode).overrideSignature: public override Decimal setScale(Integer scale, System.RoundingMode roundingMode)
setscale(integer,system.roundingmode).description: Returns the Decimal scaled to the specified number of decimal places, using the specified rounding mode, if necessary.

roundingmode.name: roundingMode
roundingmode.description: The value of scale must be between –33 and 33. If the value of scale is negative, your unscaled value is multiplied by 10 to the power of the negation of scale. For example, after this operation, the value of d is 4*10^3.Decimal d = 4000; d = d.setScale(-3);

striptrailingzeros().name: stripTrailingZeros
striptrailingzeros().description: Returns the Decimal with any trailing zeros removed.

toplainstring().name: toPlainString
toplainstring().description: Returns the String value of this Decimal, without using scientific notation.

valueof(double).name: valueOf
valueof(double).overrideSignature: public static override Decimal valueOf(Double doubleToDecimal)
valueof(double).description: Returns a Decimal that contains the value of the specified Double.

valueof(long).name: valueOf
valueof(long).overrideSignature: public static override Decimal valueOf(Long longToDecimal)
valueof(long).description: Returns a Decimal that contains the value of the specified Long.

valueof(string).name: valueOf
valueof(string).overrideSignature: public static override Decimal valueOf(String stringToDecimal)
valueof(string).description: Returns a Decimal that contains the value of the specified String. As in Java, the string is interpreted as representing a signed Decimal.
